abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Matthias Meyer at
            the Board meeting of November 24, 1997 concerning the
            Country Assistance Strategy Progress Report, Irrigation
            Sector Project, and Multimodal Transit and Trade
            Facilitation Project for Nepal.
